President Trump asserted his “complete power to pardon” in a tweet Saturday after reports emerged this week that he was discussing his ability to pardon people in the ongoing investigation into ties between his campaign and Russia.

Pepsico, Unilever and Nestlé accused of complicity in illegal rainforest destruction | Palm oil plantations on illegally deforested land in Sumatra – home to elephants, orangutans and tigers – have allegedly been used to supply scores of household brands, says new report
Trump has launched an all-out assault on the federal investigation into his campaign’s ties to Russia, reflecting an intensifying obsession with the probe within the West Wing.

Cows are emerging as an unlikely weapon in the fight against HIV as new research reveals they can produce powerful antibodies against the notorious, vaccine-resistant virus. It’s the first recorded occasion that any animal, including humans, have rapidly produced antibodies to neutralize the virus.
